priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96782

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for oncology studies relevant to the test codes that describe an assessment of response to treatment or therapy within the disease response and clinical classification domain.
name: Oncology Response Assessment Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Response Assessment Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: An assessment of the anatomic response (based on changes in size of anatomic structures) of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the most clinically favorable overall response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether disease is present in the bone marrow.
An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the bone marrow.
An assessment of the bone response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the clinical response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the clinical performance, measured by a rating or scale, as a condition of disease response to therapy. (NCI)
An assessment of the cytogenetic response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether disease recurrence occurred.
An assessment of the hematologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the liver.
An assessment of the metabolic response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether disease metastasis has occurred.
An indication as to whether major pathological response occurred.
An indication as to whether minor pathological response occurred.
An assessment of the molecular response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether the subject has minimal residual disease.
An assessment of the minimal residual disease response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the morphologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An indication as to whether new lesions are present, in comparison to a previous timepoint.
An assessment of the equivocality of disease progression based on a newly identified lesion.
An indication as to whether the previously identified new lesions are showing signs of worsening.
An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target enhancing disease. (NCI)
An indication as to whether non-target lesions, which have previously shown progression, are showing additional signs of worsening.
An assessment of the response to the therapy of the non-target non-enhancing disease. (NCI)
An assessment of the response of a non-target lesion(s) to the therapy.
An assessment of the overall response of the disease to the therapy. (NCI)
An assessment of the pathologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the radiologic response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the soft tissue response of the disease to the therapy.
An assessment of the disease response to therapy within the spleen.
An assessment of steroid usage as a condition of disease response to therapy. (NCI)
A global deterioration of health status providing evidence of disease progression not covered by disease response criteria (eg. RECIST).
An assessment of disease response to therapy based on tumor marker measurement.
An assessment of the response of a target lesion(s) to the therapy.
